scripts.dev:safe: ulimit -n 10240 2>/dev/null; concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:server: cd server && NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public && mkdir -p ../server/public && cp -r dist/* ../server/public
